front.title: IEEE Guide for Insulation Maintenance for Rotating Electrical Machinery (5 hp to less than 10 000 hp)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This insulation maintenance guide is intended to apply in general to industrial aircooled rotating electrical machines rated from 5 hp to 10 000 hp. The procedures detailed herein may be found useful for other types of machines.
